name: TanTam Demo
description:
Español  // English

 Features

  • Rrhythm game with unlockable characters.
  • Collaboration between musicians and tattoo artists.

Summary of the story

The cubeDrons have stolen the musical notes of the universe. You together with bito and his friends can recover them In the game you will find great music and customization of characters and their tattoos.

    • Controller (xbox)
  •  recommended specs to run it
    • 4 GB ram
    • 500 mb HDD
    • DX10 GPU or superior
